thread.title: Kenya: Cyber Attacks More Than Double in 2015
thread.title_full: Kenya: Cyber Attacks More Than Double in 2015

title: Kenya: Cyber Attacks More Than Double in 2015
text:
Nigeria: Relocate Boko Haram Prisoners Ohanaeze Ndigbo Urges Buhari 
HARMONISE LEGISLATION 
He added that the 19 member countries within Comesa must also work together to harmonise legislation across the region so as to tackle the menace together. 
The Kenya cyber security report 2014 quantified the intensity of the attacks to the country, saying they cost an estimated Sh5billion annually with top attacks coming from Germany and Kenya itself. 
Comesa director of infrastructure Dr Abu said Kenya is among countries with a lot of activity in ICT making it prone to attacks, this must attract government attention to development of security measures and systems. Kenya
